---
applyTo: '**'
---
- After changes, check for TS errors
- When a file go over 300 lines consider refactoring it into smaller files
- Avoid code duplication by creating reusable components or functions
- Bump the version (lib/version.ts) and update the changelog (app/changelog/page.tsx) with summarised text after changes
- Use terminal commands when you need to delete or move files
